trustfund:
TF036980-DOMINICAN REPUBLIC - PROVINCIAL
            HEALTH SERVICE,TF028730-IDF-DOMINICAN REPUBLIC ADM. REFORM,TF029364-PHRD - HEALTH SERVICES AND
            FINANCING PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Provincial Health
            Services Project is to improve the health status of the
            population by assisting in: i) the expansion of health care
            coverage to reach the poorest population groups; ii)
            improving the quality of integrated health care services
            already provided to the poor; iii) strengthening
            policy-making and management capacity of health facilities;
            and iv) fostering community participation in the health
            system. The project consists of three components. First,
            provincial subprojects will include: a) essential health
            care interventions; b) developing new health care
            organization, financing and developing managerial models to
            create provincial integrated delivery systems; c)
            institutional strengthening to reorganize and enhance the
            capacity of health facilities; and d) training and
            continuing education of health personnel. Second, the policy
            development studies component will finance workshops and
            study tours to assess the feasibility of additional policy
            and institutional reforms. Third, the project administration
            component will finance the administrative and operating
            costs of the Project Coordination Unit.
